title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Blended Learning-Based Language Proficiency Improvement Program for Adults

context.prior_knowledge: Basic literacy skills and fundamental digital device usage abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use intermediate-level language expressions (over 1,000 vocabulary words) in daily conversations and work-related contexts.
Learners can perform self-directed language learning activities using a digital platform at least three times per week.
Learners can correct over 80% of language errors through peer feedback and online quizzes in a blended learning environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
